columns.Stadium_ID: The unique identifier for each stadium.
columns.Location: The geographical area where the stadium is situated.
columns.Name: The official name of the stadium.
columns.Capacity: The total seating capacity of the stadium.
columns.Highest: The highest attendance recorded at the stadium.
columns.Lowest: The lowest attendance recorded at the stadium.
columns.Average: The average attendance observed at the stadium.

stadium.table_description: The table stores details about stadiums and their attendance records.

columns.Singer_ID: The unique identifier for each singer.
columns.Name: The official name of the singer.
columns.Country: The nation where the singer originates.
columns.Song_Name: The title of a song performed by the singer.
columns.Song_release_year: The year the song was officially released.
columns.Age: The current age of the singer.
columns.Is_male: The gender of the singer, indicated as true for male.

singer.table_description: The table stores information about singers and their songs.

columns.concert_ID: The unique identifier for each concert.
columns.concert_Name: The official name of the concert event.
columns.Theme: The theme or concept of the concert.
columns.Stadium_ID: The identifier for the stadium hosting the concert.
columns.Year: The year in which the concert takes place.

concert.table_description: The table holds details about concerts and their associated stadiums.

columns.concert_ID: The unique identifier for each concert in which a singer participates.
columns.Singer_ID: The unique identifier for each singer in the concert.

singer_in_concert.table_description: The table connects singers with their respective concerts.
